title: 2023 Focus Raven Hardtail Goes Downcountry
content:
The Focus Raven has received a down-country overhaul for 2023 with an all-new carbon frame based around 29″ wheels and a 120mm fork. Looks smart,…

The post 2023 Focus Raven Hardtail Goes Downcountry appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
